public status mat_identity (matrix mat)
 Compute the identity matrix of dimension [n] x [n]: Every element ij / i <> j is 0, every ij / i = j is 1.

Function Documentation

public status mat_identity (  matrix    mat ) 
 

Compute the identity matrix of dimension [n] x [n]: Every element ij / i <> j is 0, every ij / i = j is 1.

Parameters:
mat  a matrix allocated by mat_alloc() that will be set to the identity matrix
Returns:
SUCCESS if all went well, an error code otherwise

Set all matrix elements to the specified value.

Parameters:
mat  a matrix allocated by mat_alloc() whose values will be all set to the real value specified
value  the value to assign to all matrix elements
Returns:
SUCCESS if all went well, an error code otherwise

mat_set (  matrix    mat,
int    row,
int    col,
real    value
) 
 

set matrix element mat[row][col] to value

Parameters:
mat  the matrix whose value we want to set
row  value row offset
col  value column offset
value  value to assign to mat[row][col]
Returns:
SUCCESS if all went well, an error code otherwise
Note:
if MAT_PARANOID is defined, extra bound checking is performed at a high execution penalty.
